trans-unit.source: Represents the wst:Renewing element in a WS-Trust renew request.
trans-unit.target: 表示 WS-Trust 更新要求中的 wst:Renewing 項目。

trans-unit.source: This optional element indicates to the token issuer that the requested token can be renewed if the Allow attribute is true and that the token can be renewed after it expires if the OK attribute is true.
trans-unit.target: 此選擇性項目表示權杖的簽發者，如果允許屬性為 true，是否可以更新要求的語彙基元，並確定屬性為 true，如果到期之後，可以更新權杖。

trans-unit.source: These attributes are represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing.AllowRenewal%2A> and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing.OkForRenewalAfterExpiration%2A> properties respectively.
trans-unit.target: 這些屬性都由<xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing.AllowRenewal%2A>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing.OkForRenewalAfterExpiration%2A>屬性分別。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the element that this class represents, see the version of the WS-Trust specification that applies to your scenario.
trans-unit.target: 如需此類別代表的項目詳細資訊，請參閱適用於您案例的 Ws-trust 規格的版本。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing" /><see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing" /> class with default property values.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設屬性值，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing" /><see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for the new <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing> instance.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的初始屬性值的新<xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if renewal is permitted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果允許更新，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the requested token can be renewed after it has expired; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要求的權杖在過期後可以更新，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing" /><see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing" /> class with the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的值，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing" /><see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The properties of the new <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing> instance are set according to the value of the parameters.
trans-unit.target: 新的屬性<xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Renewing>根據參數的值設定執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the token can be renewed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出權杖是否可更新。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if renewal is permitted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果允許更新，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Represents the contents of the Allow attribute.
trans-unit.target: 表示允許屬性的內容。

trans-unit.source: This optional attribute is used to request a renewable token.
trans-unit.target: 這個選擇性屬性用來要求可更新的權杖。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 `true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the token can be renewed after it has expired.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示權杖在過期後是否可以更新。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the requested token can be renewed after it has expired; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要求的權杖在過期後可以更新，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Represents the contents of the OK attribute.
trans-unit.target: 代表 [確定] 屬性的內容。

trans-unit.source: This optional attribute is used to indicate that a renewable token is acceptable if the requested duration exceeds the limit of the issuance service.
trans-unit.target: 表示可更新的語彙基元是如果要求的持續時間超過限制的發行服務可接受用於這個選擇性屬性。

trans-unit.source: That is, if `true`, then the token can be renewed after its expiration.
trans-unit.target: 也就是說，如果`true`，則可以在其到期之後更新權杖。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `false` for security reasons.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是`false`基於安全性考量。
